title: Understanding ECMAScript 6
description: ECMAScript 6 is coming, are you ready? There's a lot of new concepts to learn and understand. Get a headstart with this book!
author: Nicholas C. Zakas

title: Exploring ES6
description: An in-depth book on ECMAScript 6, for JavaScript programmers.
author: Aaron Frost

title: You Don't Know JS: ES6 & Beyond
description: You Don't Know JS: ES6 & Beyond
author: Kyle Simpson

title: Expert JavaScript
description: Expert JavaScript is your definitive guide to understanding how and why JavaScript behaves in the way it does. Master every aspect of this powerful language, apply it pragmatically to your applications - become an expert programmer today.
author: Mark E. Daggett
